Footer.description: Digital Computer Training Academy is the best IT training academy in Gazipur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.

HeroSection.description: Digital Computer Training Academy is a platform where you can learn various technical courses. We provide the best quality courses for our students.

PopularCoursesSection.subtitle: Here are some of our popular courses. You can check these out! We offering a lot of courses also.
PopularCoursesSection.subtitle-2: Here are our all the courses that you can check out. We offer qualified courses for our students.

AboutSection.subtitle: The best IT training academy, Founded in 2009, providing various types of IT training in Manwa Chourasta, Sreepur, Gazipur.
AboutSection.description: Digital Computer Training Academy is an IT training academy founded in 2009. We are located in Mawna Chourasta, Sreepur, Gazipur. We have one branch. We are providing the training in Basic Computer Applications, Web Development, Graphic Design, Digital Marketing, etc. courses to our students.

SuccessStoriesSection.subtitle: Many students have achieved success by learning from us. Here are some of their stories.

InstructorsSection.subtitle: We have 20 instructors who are highly qualified and experienced in their respective fields. They are dedicated to providing the best training to our students.

ContactSection.subtitle: Have questions about our programs? Reach out to us and our team will get back to you shortly.
ContactSection.location-subtitle: Here is our location information with other information that helps you to find us.
